section.title: Adding a certificate into a ramdisk image
section.para: As root, from a folder where the ramdisk image is present, perform the following steps.

listitem.para: Download the ramdisk image to /tmp/ and name the file ironic-deploy.initramfs
Create a temporary folder that will hold the temporarily extracted image contents.
Change your shell working directory to the temporary folder
Extract the original deployment archive file.
